div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 340px; margin-left: 1022px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
(2)
reconciles
(as it watches for new Brokers
with broker.class = Kafka)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 316px; margin-left: 1351px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
(4)
updates .status.address pointing
to kafka-broker-ingress pods
path: http://kafka-broker-ingress..../<broker-namespace>/<broker-name>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 500px; margin-left: 1463px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
(6)
reconciles triggers associated
with brokers of the type it watches
(brokers.class = Kafka in this case)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 515px; margin-left: 713px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
(3) / (7)
updates the resources
according to the scheme in
contract.proto,
e.g. when a trigger/broker gets
created/updated.

div.font:
watches for changes on the file mount for the
kafka-broker-brokers-triggers configmap,
containing all relevant resources and configures itself,
so the dispatcher sends new events to the subscribers

switch.text: watches for changes on the file mount for the...

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
